WorkItem.ClosedComment: Sorry, we don’t allow user to skip the working step.
WorkItem.Description:
So when you click directly onto another option or step? It doesn’t allow. It does show a pop up message. But however, the pop up message box has no header text indicating whether it’s a warning or an error. 

Also you can press the + button on the top and move on anyways, without the error boxes so that kind of defeats the purpose. It would be nice if the error boxes had header texts.
WorkItem.Summary: Error messages when skipping a step
